Establish a global carbon capture and storage system to combat climate change and reduce greenhouse gas emissions. This would help to slow the effects of climate change and ensure a more sustainable future for all.

Develop a comprehensive, interconnected transportation system that utilizes renewable energy sources and promotes the use of electric and hybrid vehicles. This would help to reduce air pollution, traffic congestion, and reliance on fossil fuels.
Implement a universal basic income to ensure that every person has access to the resources they need to live a dignified and fulfilling life. This would help to reduce poverty and income inequality.
Create a global healthcare system that provides free, high-quality medical care to all, regardless of income or social status. This would improve the overall health and well-being of the population.

Develop a global infrastructure for clean water and sanitation, ensuring that every person has access to clean drinking water and proper waste management. This would improve public health and reduce the spread of waterborne diseases.
